      public static boolean solutionExists() throws java.lang.InterruptedException

      Parameters:

    • placePiece

      public static void placePiece​(Piece p)
      Since the front-end should already know the valid placements, this method won't do any checking.
      Parameters:
      p - the Piece to place on the Board

    • getAvailableSpots

      public static java.util.Set<Point> getAvailableSpots​(Piece piece)
      Gets a list of Points where you can put the provided Piece.
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece you want to check the available spots.
      Returns:
      a list of valid Points where you can place the piece

    • clearSquare

      public static void clearSquare​(Point p, boolean applyChangesView)
      Clear everything off the Square, the piece and if it's a Hole
      Parameters:
      p - the point on the board to clear

    • saveLevel

      Exports the board to a file. Call this when the user is done creating the level.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException
